changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingSchema}.PK_FLUVIAL_FORECAST_LOCATION_JOB', 'PK') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingSchema}.PK_FLUVIAL_FORECAST_LOCATION_JOB', 'PK_DATETIME2_FLUVIAL_FORECAST_LOCATION_JOB';

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingSchema}.PK_DATETIME2_FLUVIAL_FORECAST_LOCATION_JOB', 'PK') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingSchema}.PK_DATETIME2_FLUVIAL_FORECAST_LOCATION_JOB', 'PK_FLUVIAL_FORECAST_LOCATION_JOB';
